name: eve-jita-ai-trader
description: Monorepo for EVE Jita AI Trader (docs bootstrap -> implementation)

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n frontend,backend -c green,blue "npm run -w @eve-jita-ai/frontend dev" "npm run -w @eve-jita-ai/backend dev"
scripts.build-serve: npm run -w @eve-jita-ai/frontend build && npm run -w @eve-jita-ai/backend dev
